TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WebBaseEvent extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件定义基类。

span.span: Defines the base class for the ASP.NET health-monitoring events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类是所有的 ASP.NET 运行状况监视事件类型的继承树的根。The class is the root of the inheritance tree for all the ASP.NET health-monitoring event types. 它使用类来获取其派生类可用的应用程序信息。It uses the class to obtain application information that is available to its derived class. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下你将能够实现时，使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，你将通过指定中的值来控制运行状况监视系统``配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `` configuration section. 您还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义运行状况监视事件。The following example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom health-monitoring event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#1)] 下面的示例是使 ASP.NET 能够使用自定义事件的配置文件的摘录。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the custom event. ``` ```

span.para: 当设置格式显示有关您自定义事件的信息时，重写方法而不是方法。这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。事件代码指定自定义事件必须是大于。

When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. The event code you specify for your custom event must be greater than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您不应使用它来创建的实例类，但可以实现自己从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when you implement your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为事件的信息，这很有用，如果必须记录事件数据，并将其更高版本提供给用户提供统一的格式。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 当提供程序调用了一个在内部调用方法。It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. > [!NOTE] > 当设置格式显示有关您自定义事件的信息时，重写方法而不是方法。When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何自定义方法。The following code example shows how to customize the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常由处理该事件的提供程序调用。The method is generally invoked by the provider that processes the event. 该方法可确保标准对象提供特定于事件的数据。The method ensures that the standard object is provided with the event-specific data. 它通过调用特定于事件的格式的事件信息方法。It formats event information by calling the event-specific method. > [!NOTE] > 当设置格式显示有关您自定义事件的信息时，重写方法而不是方法。When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法The following code example shows how to use the method [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常由处理该事件的提供程序调用。The method is generally invoked by the provider that processes the event. 它通过调用特定于事件的格式的事件信息方法。It formats event information by calling the event-specific method. 如果`includeAppInfo`是`true`，标准对象提供特定于事件的数据。If `includeAppInfo` is `true`, the standard object is provided with the event-specific data. > [!NOTE] > 当设置格式显示有关您自定义事件的信息时，重写方法而不是方法。When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.
